name: Docker Desktop
description: Docker Desktop tracks all app interactions, checks for updates and sends crash reports.

telemetry.name: Usage data
telemetry.description: All app interactions are tracked via [segment.com](https://segment.com/)

noop.name: Block tracking
noop.description:
Add this record to your hosts file to block access to Segment
 ```
0.0.0.0 api.segment.io
```

noop.name: Block tracking
noop.description:
Add this record to your hosts file to block access to Wootric
 ```
0.0.0.0 api.wootric.com
```

telemetry.name: Crash data
telemetry.description: Crash reports are uploaded to the [www.bugsnag.com](https://www.bugsnag.com/)

noop.name: Block crash reports
noop.description:
Add this record to your hosts file to block access to Bugsnag
```
0.0.0.0 notify.bugsnag.com
0.0.0.0 sessions.bugsnag.com
```

telemetry.name: Update check
telemetry.description: Updates are forced, unless you upgrade to a paid plan

noop.name: Block update check
noop.description:
Add this record to your hosts file to block update checks
```
0.0.0.0 desktop.docker.com
```

noop.name: github.com | RektInator/kill-docker-auto-update
noop.description: This repository contains patched binaries that disable the auto-updating process of Docker Desktop. If you rather patch the binaries yourself, the instructions can be found under [Patching Docker Manually](https://github.com/RektInator/kill-docker-auto-update#patching-docker-manually).
